title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Do Business With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Do Business With Us            Do Business With Us       If you plan on making North Cascades National Park Complex a destination for a special event or activity, or if you are a commercial or non-profit organization wishing to conduct services and/or activities within park boundaries, please review the information on this page carefully to determine the type of permit required.  General Permit, Fees, and Reservations (Entrance Fees, Car Camping Fees, Backcountry Permits, Dock Fees, and Parking Information, etc.)   COMMERCIAL USE AUTHORIZATIONS   SPECIAL USE PERMITS (Including special events such as weddings, spreading of ashes, first amendment activities, organized event, etc.)    FILMING and Photography    Research Permits  National parks make wonderful laboratories. If you are interested in a permit for conducting research in the park visit the National Park Service Research Permit and Reporting System.         Â    Current CUA Holder Services   Visit the Guided Services page for a complete list of companies who operate by permit within North Cascades National Park Service Complex. Services offered include: outfitters for tours, horseback riding, raft, float, and fishing, canoeing, packing, bicycling, climbing, and hiking.
